Package moe.reno.littlenebo.chat

Class ChatManager

java.lang.Object
moe.reno.littlenebo.chat.ChatManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.bukkit.event.Listener
public class ChatManager extends Object implements org.bukkit.event.Listener
Manages interception and formatting of player chat messages.

Listens for the Paper AsyncChatEvent, captures raw player input, and delegates rendering to NeboChatRenderer, which in turn uses formatMessage(Player, String) to apply MiniMessage or legacy formatting based on the plugin configuration.

  • Constructor Details

    • ChatManager

      public ChatManager(LittleNebo plugin, ConfigManager configManager)
      Constructs a ChatManager and registers a custom chat renderer.
      Parameters:
      plugin - main plugin instance for access to logger and config
      configManager - central config manager containing chat settings and formats

  • Method Details

    • onChat

      public void onChat(io.papermc.paper.event.player.AsyncChatEvent event)
      Handles incoming chat events at high priority.

      Converts the incoming Component message to plain text, stores it for rendering, and assigns a custom renderer so that other plugins still receive the original event.

      Parameters:
      event - the async chat event containing the player's message

    • formatMessage

      public net.kyori.adventure.text.Component formatMessage(org.bukkit.entity.Player player, String message)
      Formats a chat message for display to a viewer.

      Chooses a FormatConfig based on player permissions, then applies either legacy '&' codes or MiniMessage templates. PlaceholderAPI placeholders are resolved in names and templates.

      Parameters:
      player - the player who sent the chat (used for permissions/placeholders)
      message - the raw message text (no formatting)
      Returns:
      a fully formatted Component ready to send
